categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Deflector was a member of the Rebel Alliance. He was put on a courier mission for the Alliance Fleet in 0 ABY with Tracer a few weeks after the Evacuation of Yavin. They were shot down over Trivar II, with Deflector becoming critically wounded, and died in Imperial custody in the city of Glare Peak. Tracer was then rescued by Rebel agents.
Deflector appears in Rescue at Glare Peak, a special 2014 promotional adventure for Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game.
